# URL formats.
https?:\/\/\S+
www.\S+

# GUIDs.
\b[0-9a-zA-Z]{8}-([0-9a-zA-Z]{4}-){3}[0-9a-zA-Z]{12}\b

# SHA checksums.
sha[0-9]{3}-[0-9a-zA-Z+/]{64}

# Git commit hashes.
\b([0-9a-f]{40})\b

# Hex color codes.
#[0-9a-fA-F]{3,6}\b

# Ignores lines that contain the "#spell-check-ignore-line" text.
^.*/\* #spell-check-ignore-line \*/.*$
